entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
